data.md:MetaData: Lithology of sediment core LALA, Lake Lala Mare, Romania

Lake in Rodnei mountain. Physiography: glacial origine. Surrounding vegetation: Picea, Pinus mugo & cembro. Local vegetation: Eriophorum, Carex, Juncus. Location: in slope peat of the ridge's lake. Core diameter: 6 cm
Aspects de l'histoire de la végétation holocène des Monts Rodnei (Carpates orientales)
